1.text: Fill a plastic bag with ice.

2.text: Place the bag of ice on top of the silly putty.
2.vid: /8/8e/Get Silly Putty Out of Carpet Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Let the silly putty harden under the ice for 2 - 3 hours.

4.text: Break up the hardened silly putty with a knife.

5.text: Soak a cotton ball in acetone nail polish remover.
5.vid: /c/c2/Get Silly Putty Out of Carpet Step 10.360p.mp4

6.text: Blot the silly putty with the cotton ball.

7.text: Use a knife to scrape away the silly putty.

8.text: Repeat the process until all the silly putty is gone.

9.text: Mix two spoonfuls of mild laundry detergent into a cup of warm water.

10.text: Soak a cotton ball in the diluted detergent mixture.
10.vid: /c/c6/Get Silly Putty Out of Carpet Step 6.360p.mp4

11.text: Use the cotton ball to blot the carpet stain and any remaining silly putty.

12.text: Let the detergent soak into the carpet and leftover silly putty for 20 minutes.

13.text: Use a damp cloth to wipe the stained area.
